item.title: Worldcoin Launches Feature To Allow Unverified Users To Reserve WLD Tokens
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
Sam Altman’s Worldcoin on Friday announces the launch of a new feature allowing even unverified users to reserve Worldcoin (WLD) tokens. Worldcoin’s aim to build the world’s largest identity and financial network attracted scrutiny from regulators around the world and reluctance from the crypto industry due to privacy and safety concerns. Worldcoin Launches WLD Tokens

The post Worldcoin Launches Feature To Allow Unverified Users To Reserve WLD Tokens appeared first on CoinGape.

item.description:
While the broader crypto market consolidates, the Shiba Inu (SHIB) price has surged 3% in the last 24 hours. item.title: Breaking: Bitwise Revises Bitcoin Futures ETF To Bitcoin And Ether Strategy ETF
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
Bitwise files an updated prospectus to change its Bitcoin futures ETF to a Bitcoin and Ether equal weight strategy exchange-traded fund (ETF). This is similar to a move by Valkyrie to revise its Bitcoin Strategy ETF to Bitcoin and Ether Strategy ETF amid a flurry of Ethereum-focused ETF filings. Bitwise Converts Filing To Bitcoin And

The post Breaking: Bitwise Revises Bitcoin Futures ETF To Bitcoin And Ether Strategy ETF appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: US SEC Slaps $24 Million Penalty on Bittrex, Here’s Why
item.dc:creator: Bhushan Akolkar
item.description:
The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has slapped a $24 million penalty on the crypto exchange Bittrex for offering client services without any registration with the federal securities regulator. Earlier this year in April, the SEC had already alleged that Bittrex was functioning as an unregistered securities exchange, clearing agency, and broker in the

The post US SEC Slaps $24 Million Penalty on Bittrex, Here’s Why appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: XRP Price On Gemini Exchange Shoots $50 Amid Major Glitch
item.dc:creator: Bhushan Akolkar
item.description:
On Thursday, August 10, crypto exchange Gemini finally decided to end the wait and relist the XRP token on its platform. The exchange has unveiled its endorsement for the XRP Ledger blockchain, making the Gemini API/FIX and ActiveTrader applications accessible for trading XRP/USD pairs. item.title: Breaking: Gemini Relists XRP Token, Opens Support For XRP Ledger (XRPL)
item.dc:creator: Anvesh Reddy
item.description:

item.description:

item.title: Breaking: DCG Files Motion to Dismiss Gemini Lawsuit
item.dc:creator: Godfrey Benjamin
item.description:
Crypto venture firm Digital Currency Group (DCG) has filed a motion requesting the dismissal of the lawsuit levied against the company and its founder Barry Silbert by the Winklevoss brothers’ cryptocurrency exchange Gemini.  The Gemini DCG Legal Showdown According to DCG’s legal team, the lawsuit is “a continuation of the Winklevoss’s year-long Twitter-based character assassination.” 

The post Breaking: DCG Files Motion to Dismiss Gemini Lawsuit appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Breaking: US CPI Inflation Comes In At 3.2%, Bitcoin And Ethereum Price To Rally?
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
The annual CPI inflation for the month of July comes in at 3.2% against market expectations of 3.3%, according to the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics. In addition, the Core CPI inflation comes in at 4.7% against market expectation of 4.8%, with the monthly rate also remaining at 0.2%. The annual inflation data coming in hotter than last month’s 3% gives

The post Breaking: US CPI Inflation Comes In At 3.2%, Bitcoin And Ethereum Price To Rally? appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
The annual CPI inflation for the month of July comes in at 3.2% against market expectations of 3.3%, according to the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics. item.title: Binance Delisting Cardano (ADA) And Polygon (MATIC), But There’s A Catch
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
The world’s largest crypto exchange Binance on Thursday announces delisting of Cardano (ADA) And Polygon (MATIC) perpetual contacts next week. The exchange will adjust the leverage and margin tiers of ADABUSD and MATICBUSD perpetual contracts today and delist them after an automatic settlement as per the plan. Binance Delisting Cardano (ADA) And Polygon (MATIC) Perpetuals

The post Binance Delisting Cardano (ADA) And Polygon (MATIC), But There’s A Catch appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:

The exchange will adjust the leverage and margin tiers of ADABUSD and MATICBUSD perpetual contracts today and delist them after an automatic settlement as per the plan.
